legend.span: আপনার বাড়ীর ঠিকানা কি পরিবর্তন হয়েছে?

label.span: Collect GPS coordinates of data entry location:

legend.span: আপনি কি আপনার শেষ মাসিকের তারিখ, EDD, শেষ আল্ট্রাসাউন্ডের তারিখ জানেন?
Do you know your LMP, EDD or last Ultrasound information?

label.span: EDD cannot be in the past
LMP cannot be in the future

option.data-items-path: instance('vaccines')/root/item[name= 'TT5' or name= 'TT4' or name= 'TT3' or name= 'TT2' or name= 'TT1']

instance('vaccines')/root/item[(name = 'TT1' and /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt1 = '' ) or (name = 'TT2' and /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt1 != '' and /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt2 = '' ) or (name = 'TT3' and /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt2 != '' and /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt3 = '' ) or (name = 'TT4' and /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt3 != '' and /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt4 = '' ) or (name = 'TT5' and /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt4 != '' and /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt5 = '' )]

label.span: তারিখ অবশ্যই আজকের আগে এবং মহিলার বয়স ১৫ বছরের বেশি হতে হবে
Provided date must be before visit date and must be received in or after 15th year of age
টিটি-১ দেওয়া না থাকলে টিটি-২ দেওয়া যাবেনা টিটি-১ দেওয়ার ৪ সপ্তাহ পর টিটি-২ দেওয়া যাবে
TT-2 can't be given before TT-1. TT-2 can be given 4 weeks after TT-1
টিটি-২ দেওয়া না থাকলে টিটি-৩ দেওয়া যাবেনা। টিটি-২ দেওয়ার ২৬ সপ্তাহ পর টিটি-৩ দেওয়া যাবে
TT-3 can't be given before TT-2. TT-3 can be given 26 weeks after TT-2
টিটি-৩ দেওয়া না থাকলে টিটি-৪ দেওয়া যাবেনা। টিটি-৩ দেওয়ার ৫২ সপ্তাহ পর টিটি-৪ দেওয়া যাবে
TT-4 can't be given before TT-3. TT-4 can be given 52 weeks after TT-3
টিটি-৪ দেওয়া না থাকলে টিটি-৫ দেওয়া যাবেনা। টিটি-৪ দেওয়ার ৫২ সপ্তাহ পর টিটি-৫ দেওয়া যাবে
TT-5 can't be given before TT-4. TT-4 can be given 52 weeks after TT-3
আজকের ভিজিটে যেসব টীকা দেওয়া হয়েছে-

option.data-items-path: instance('vaccines')/root/item[(name = 'TT1' and not(selected( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/vaccines1 , 'TT1')) ) or (name = 'TT2' and number( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/today - /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/tt1_retro )>27 and (selected( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/vaccines1 , 'TT1')) and not(selected( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/vaccines1 , 'TT2')) ) or (name = 'TT3' and number( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/today - /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/tt2_retro )>181 and (selected( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/vaccines1 , 'TT2')) and not(selected( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/vaccines1 , 'TT3')) ) or (name = 'TT4' and number( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/today - /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/tt3_retro )>363 and (selected( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/vaccines1 , 'TT3')) and not(selected( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/vaccines1 , 'TT4')) ) or (name = 'TT5' and number( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/today - /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/tt4_retro )>363 and (selected( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/vaccines1 , 'TT4')) and not(selected( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/vaccines1 , 'TT5')) )]

label.span: আজকের ভিজিটে যেসব টীকা দেওয়া হয়েছে-

option.data-items-path: instance('vaccines')/root/item[(name = 'TT1' and not(selected( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/vaccines , 'TT1')) and /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt1 = '' ) or (name = 'TT2' and ((number( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/today - /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/tt1_retro )>27 and selected( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/vaccines , 'TT1')) or ( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt1 != '' and number( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/today - /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt1 )>27 )) and not(selected( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/vaccines , 'TT2')) and /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt2 = '' ) or (name = 'TT3' and ((number( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/today - /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/tt2_retro )>181 and selected( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/vaccines , 'TT2')) or ( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt2 != '' and number( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/today - /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt2 )>181 )) and not(selected( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/vaccines , 'TT3')) and /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt3 = '' ) or (name = 'TT4' and ((number( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/today - /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/tt3_retro )>363 and selected( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/vaccines , 'TT3')) or ( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt3 != '' and number( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/today - /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt3 )>363 )) and not(selected( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/vaccines , 'TT4')) and /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt4 = '' ) or (name = 'TT5' and ((number( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/today - /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/tt4_retro )>363 and selected( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/vaccines , 'TT4')) or ( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt4 != '' and number( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/today - /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt4 )>363 )) and not(selected( /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/vaccines , 'TT5')) and /Woman_TT_Followup_Form/e_tt5 = '' )]
